task.instruction: Your user ID is sophia_davis_8874, and you have a reservation with the ID NVLFIW. You would like to review the booking details to confirm the name and date of birth of a passenger named Annya, which should match that of another passenger on the reservation, except for the month—hers should be May. A recent mobile notification made you concerned that her name may have been misspelled during the booking process. If either the name or date of birth is incorrect, you need to update Annya’s details accordingly. You will remain responsive to the agent but will only share the information necessary to complete the correction.
